name: Constellation Traveller
description:
<<ABOUT>>

A chill endless runner game  where you help the owl to catch her stars souls family. Carefful with the meteors!

When the owl reaches its life limit, it's happen a special trait about the character. Curious? Discover as you play!

<<CREDITS>>

  • Development  in GDeveloper model
  • Game Design, Soundesigner and 2D sprites: Ludmila Nascy
  • Background Image Sky: LuminousDragonGames

<<HOW TO PLAY ON LINE>>

  • Move arrows keys do left or right 
  •  Use the Mouse Cursor on Web Browser.

<<HOW TO PLAY IN MOBILE BETTER>>

  • Touch the screen, hold while dragging the owl for more precise movements.
